periodKey.description: Identifier for the period of the VAT return.

vatDueSales.description: VAT due on sales and other outputs. Box (1) on VAT Return form.

vatDueAcquisitions.description: VAT due on acquisitions from other EC Member States. Box (2) on VAT Return form.

totalVatDue.description: Total VAT due (the sum of boxes 1 and 2). Box (3) on VAT Return form.

vatReclaimedCurrPeriod.description: VAT reclaimed on purchases and other inputs (including acquisitions from the EC). Box (4) on VAT Return form.

netVatDue.description: The difference between boxes 3 and 4. Deduct the smaller from the larger and enter the difference in box 5. If the figure in box 3 is more than the figure in box 4, the difference is the amount you must pay.

totalValueSalesExVAT.description: Total value of sales and all other outputs excluding any VAT. Box (6) on VAT Return form.

totalValuePurchasesExVAT.description: Total value of purchases and all other inputs excluding any VAT (including exempt purchases). Box (7) on VAT Return form.

totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT.description: Total value of all supplies of goods and related costs, excluding any VAT, to other EC member states. Box (8) on VAT Return form.

totalAcquisitionsExVAT.description: Total value of acquisitions of goods and related costs excluding any VAT, from other EC member states. Box (8) on VAT Return form.

monetaryPos.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0 and 49,999,999,999.99

monetaryPosNeg.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between -49,999,999,999.99 and 49,999,999,999.99
